schematics.description: A map of schematic names to schematic details

factory.description: A folder or file path to the schematic factory

extends.description: An schematic override. It can be a local schematic or from another collection (in the format 'collection:schematic')

schema.description: Location of the schema.json file of the schematic

hidden.description: Whether or not this schematic should be listed by the tooling. This does not prevent the tooling to run this schematic, just removes its name from listSchematicNames().

private.description: Whether or not this schematic can be called from an external schematic, or a tool. This implies hidden: true.
